title: Can Solana overcome the FTX collapse? Avorak AI provides deep-learning insights
description: The close association between FTX and Solana, including investments and integration, proves detrimental as funds and users leave the platform. FTX-owned hedge fund Alameda Research acquired a significant portion of SOL. The Solana Foundation also had exposure to FTX-related assets, now stuck on the bankrupt exchange. What is Solana? Solana is a blockchain platform for […]

title: Over 2 Million ETH Staked In May, Tradecurve Holders Aiming For 3000% Growth
description: The popularity of Ethereum staking has grown exponentially since its Shapella upgrade in April. While some analysts were concerned about potential liquidity issues, Ethereum staking has never been more popular, which has been a big boost for the Ethereum ecosystem. However, Ethereum’s price hasn’t reflected this new attention. As a result, some investors are now […]

title: Jimbo, a DeFi protocol, hacked for $7.5m in a slippage-related flaw
description: Jimbo, a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol, is the latest to suffer an attack resulting in the loss of 4,090 ethereum (ETH), worth $7.5 million
